testcase.name: E2E: Friend Request to Direct Messaging Flow > Multiple Friends Scenario > should manage multiple friendships independently
E2E: Friend Request to Direct Messaging Flow > Message Visibility and Privacy > should ensure messages are only visible to recipients
E2E: Friend Request to Direct Messaging Flow > Message Visibility and Privacy > should allow reactions only from message recipients
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Complete Group Messaging Lifecycle > should deliver group message to all members
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Complete Group Messaging Lifecycle > should support multi-sender conversation in group
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Complete Group Messaging Lifecycle > should deliver messages only to current members
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should prevent non-member from sending messages
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should prevent non-member from reading message history
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should block messages after member is removed
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should block messages after member leaves
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Encrypted Group Messages > should support encrypted flag on group creation
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Encrypted Group Messages > should support sending encrypted content in group messages
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Message History and Pagination > should return messages in reverse chronological order
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Message History and Pagination > should support limit parameter for pagination
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should enforce owner/admin/member permission hierarchy
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should allow admin to remove member but not other admins
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should only allow owner to promote/demote members
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should prevent changing owner role
E2E: Group Permission Management > Group Deletion > should only allow owner to delete group
E2E: Group Permission Management > Owner Leave Restriction > should prevent owner from leaving the group
E2E: Group Permission Management > Public vs Private Groups > should allow joining public group without invitation
E2E: Group Permission Management > Public vs Private Groups > should require invitation for private group
E2E: Group Permission Management > Member Limit Enforcement > should enforce max member limit
E2E: Group Permission Management > Member Limit Enforcement > should allow joining after member leaves
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should support full invitation lifecycle: invite -> view -> accept
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should support invitation rejection
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should prevent duplicate invitations
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should prevent inviting existing members
E2E: Group Permission Management > Group Update Permissions > should allow owner and admin to update group info
E2E: Group Permission Management > Group Update Permissions > should prevent member from updating group info
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Complete Inbound Webhook Flow > should deliver external message to all friends via public visibility
